option.od: print the help message and exit.
register the task under the name taskname with the Operating System.
use the data buffers of the task registered under the name dname with the Operating System.
allow registered tasks a total of no more than tsec seconds to respond to a message.
allow each individual registered task no more than ssec seconds to respond to a message.

synopsis.p: A data relay task for distributing raw A/D data.
